channel.title: How do i add ::pickup to my server just for admins?
channel.description: hey guys i was wondering how i put that into my server without getting any errors when i compiling it thanks fireboy11985

item.title: How do i add ::pickup to my server just for admins?
item.dc:creator: @run3scap3_uk run3scap3_uk
item.description:
@run3scap3_uk wrote:

Follow steps

Open source
Open ‘Client’ file
Search “Pickup”
You’d find a sentance begining with If a command, change the = 0 or = 1 to = 2
save and compile

Read full topic
